MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich affecting properties in Main Road , Chapel Street and the surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:04am on the 31st December 2020.
